home.paragraph1: Hi, I'm Olmeiro, a Javascript developer. Some of my strengths are productivity, commitment, and a strong sense of teamwork. I do my best to achieve the proposed goals.
home.paragraph2: Every day, I put all my efforts into learning, and I'm always open to starting new projects to boost my career as a developer. Do not hesitate to contact me.

contact.title: Let's work together
contact.paragraph: Let's build the future. If you want to reach out me call me or fill out the next form.
contact.footer: I hope to hear from you.
contact.name: Name
